networkFilterPatterns.description: // set an array of regex patterns to filter network requests and responses

cookiesShouldBeSaved.description: // cookies will be cleaned by default, set an array of hostname to save a set of cookies in cache. // production accounts are usually stable, so it's recommended to save the cookies from production environment to avoid repeated login.

authSites.description: // set an array of hostname to determine auth pages. // auto login will be triggered if available auth are set in auth file. otherwise, the process will be paused and wait for manual login by user.

authFilePath.description: // set the path to the auth file
